title: Recraft V3 - State-of-the-Art Image Generation with Superior Text
excerpt: Discover Recraft V3 - the SOTA model with exceptional text rendering, multiple style presets, and consistent visual quality.
content:
What is Recraft V3?

Recraft V3 is a cutting-edge AI image generation model developed by Recraft AI. It has achieved state-of-the-art (SOTA) status on multiple benchmarks and is particularly renowned for its exceptional text rendering capabilities and versatile style system.

Why Recraft V3 Stands Out

Best-in-Class Text Rendering

One of the biggest challenges in AI image generation is rendering readable text. Recraft V3 excels here:

  • Clear, legible text in images
  • Multiple font styles supported
  • Proper text perspective and integration
  • Minimal spelling errors compared to other models

Built-in Style Presets

Unlike models that require complex prompting for different styles, Recraft V3 includes professional style presets:

  • Realistic: Photorealistic imagery
  • Digital Illustration: Clean vector-like art
  • Vector: Scalable graphics style
  • Realistic Image: Enhanced photo quality
  • Icon: Perfect for app icons

Consistent Quality

Recraft V3 produces remarkably consistent outputs:

  • Reliable quality across different prompts
  • Predictable style adherence
  • Minimal quality variance between generations
  • Professional-grade outputs by default

Text in Images - A Game Changer

Why Text Matters

Many real-world applications require text in images:

  • Marketing banners and ads
  • Social media graphics
  • Product mockups with labels
  • Signage and storefronts
  • Book covers and posters

How Recraft V3 Handles Text

The model was specifically trained to:

  1. Understand text as distinct from image content
  2. Render characters accurately
  3. Apply appropriate styling
  4. Integrate text naturally into scenes

Text Prompting Tips

For best text results:

"A coffee shop storefront with a sign reading 'BREW HAVEN' in elegant serif font, warm morning light, cozy urban setting"

Key techniques:

  • Put text in quotes within your prompt
  • Specify font style if important
  • Keep text short (1-3 words work best)
  • Consider placement in your scene description

Prompt Examples

Marketing Banner

"Modern tech startup banner, text 'INNOVATE TODAY' in bold sans-serif, gradient blue to purple background, abstract geometric shapes, professional marketing style"

Product Mockup

"Premium coffee bag packaging, text 'MORNING BREW' in elegant typography, kraft paper texture, rustic coffee beans scattered, product photography style"

Social Media Graphic

"Motivational quote poster, text 'Dream Big' in handwritten style font, watercolor sunset background, inspirational aesthetic"

Using Recraft V3 on Pixelift

To create images with Recraft V3:

  1. Open the AI Image Generator
  2. Select "Recraft V3" from the Featured category
  3. Choose a style preset that matches your needs
  4. Enter your prompt (remember to quote any text)
  5. Generate your image

Each generation costs 2 credits.

When to Choose Recraft V3

Recraft V3 is the best choice when:

  • Your image needs readable text
  • You want consistent style presets
  • You're creating marketing or brand materials
  • Predictable quality is important
  • You need professional-grade outputs without extensive prompting

For pure photorealism without text, Flux models might be preferable. But for versatility and text rendering, Recraft V3 leads the pack.
